tool_description: Make unit conversions easy with our straightforward Unit Converters API.
name: All Units Converters
title: All Units Converters

api_list.name: Get Converter Details
api_list.description: Retrieve conversion factor for a specific converter using its unique identifier from the List API.

api_list.name: List Converters
api_list.description: Retrieve a comprehensive list of conversion categories and their associated converters, covering a wide range of units.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://all-units-converters.p.rapidapi.com/converters.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-units-converters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://all-units-converters.p.rapidapi.com/converters.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "all-units-converters.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
